entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Double-clicking C# inline hints in order inserts their texts in wrong positions #77777

Closed

  • [EnC] Deleting partial definition that doesn't have an implementation fails assertion #77340

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not call JTF.Run from a bg thread in options initialization #77788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Set the default namespace for the project and proper folders for documents #77787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not allow System.CommandLine to swallow all unhandled exceptions in LSP server #77786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement support for Semantic Search agent and tool #77784
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation - Add remarks if available #77783
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Address PROTOTYPE comment in ExtensionMethodBodyRewriter #77782
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Disallow complex forms of IndexerName attributes in extensions #77781
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Feedback from analyzer loading change #77780
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Change SVsBrokeredServiceContainer retrieval to not use RoslynServiceExtensions #77775
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Revert "Stop using the rename dashboard"" #77774
    Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Fix move to namespace offering for primary constructor #77751
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix integration tests by adding skip for Codelens issue #77758
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: account for new extensions in function type scenarios #77755
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix handling of partial definition deletes #77735
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable Server GC for OOP #77739
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Stop using the rename dashboard" #77770
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Updated

  • Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread #77768
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support ILogger.BeginScope() for LSP logging #77647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Null-conditional assignment: Add tests from test plan review #77717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77789
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Generate Documentation - Add loading state #77718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce likelihood of needing a dual insertion in VS Code #77715
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make `Implement with Copilot` light up on member name #77769
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15' => 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' #77773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix issue with disappearing newlines after multiline documentation comment #77521
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Implement name and signature conflict check across extension containers with the same receiver type #77747
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Parse ignored directives #77696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • [release/dev17.12] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #77262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.13] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #77570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
